response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000 to us. Considering its immense worth to you, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored for someone with your discerning taste and business acumen.

Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be investing in a solution that promises long-term benefits and unparalleled performance. We are confident that our product will meet and exceed your expectations.

Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
